title: Boss Battles, Combat & Stingers - Action/Adventure Music!
description: 27 Unique Battle tracks and 15 stingers - epic and action packed!
longDescription:
Welcome to my "Boss Battles, Combat & Stingers" music pack!


Preview all songs here:  Preview - Soundcloud

And here: Preview - Youtube


Inside this pack you will find 27 musical tracks and 15 Stingers totaling just over 1 HOUR of content. Using both live instrument recordings, as well as virtual instruments I hope to bring in truly EPIC music into your game to take your players to other worlds. ALL MUSIC IS YOUTUBE SAFE!


Genre/feel:

This pack includes 4 main categories of tracks:

  • Boss Battles
  • Heroic Battles
  • Tense Battles
  • Stingers

These tracks are all geared towards Adventure, Fantasy, and Action games. Inspired by some of the best soundtracks on the market such as: Ori, The Witcher, Halo, Snash Bros. Various Zelda games and more.  


What is a stinger?

A stinger is a short musical or percussive track that can act as an introduction, ending, or link to various scenes in your game. A popular example is a mysterious musical run when a player encounters a chest, or when a player encounters a Boss.

I created 15 unique stingers for you to add into your game under 4 categories: Evil, Positive, Neutral, and Mysterious.  These are rarely included in music packs, so take advantage of this opportunity! 


Why this pack?!

I am a professional composer who has had music on national television shows such as: The Bachelor, Backyard Bar Wars, The Bacelorette, and Noone Can Hear You Scream. This means that each track is professionally composed, mixed, and mastered to guarantee the highest quality sound for your game. Each track has carefully crafted melody and harmony to ensure interest and repeatability in your game so the track never gets old.

Some of these tracks have upwards of 4 unique musical sections within ONE single track.


LOOPABLE:

Each Boss Battle and Combat track in this pack loops perfectly. Reverb tails were carefully added to each track to ensure that all tracks will loop perfectly and seamlessly with no snaps cracks or pops. The stingers are not meant to be loopable.

I personally guarantee your satisfaction with these tracks and hope you enjoy the music as much as I enjoyed making it for you.

*All updates will be free after your first purchase!*

Art brought to you by:  Yoosin Art (Instagram Link)

Please contact me with any questions:dkcompose@gmail.com
